items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian benchmarks set for higher open, led by Wall Street, Asian markets
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Markets in India were headed for a strong open on Friday, led by overnight gains on the Wall Street, which was driving Asian markets higher as well.

items.title: Market today: Dow, S&P 500 hit record highs; your trading guide for Sept 20
items.description: Share market today: In the US, the S&P 500 and Dow Jones closed at record highs. The Dow Jones finished up 1.26 per cent and the S&P 500 closed 1.7 per cent higher

items.title: Stocks To Watch: HDFC Bank, IIFL Finance, Nykaa, Macrotech Developers, TCS
items.description: Stocks to Watch: Nykaa has increased its same and next-day delivery capabilities to 110 cities, with 60 per cent of the orders fulfilled within one day.

items.title: Nifty Pharma, FMCG indices range-bound; Check support and other levels here
items.description: The Nifty Pharma Index is currently trading in a defined range between 23,700 and 22,700. This suggests that the market is experiencing indecision, with neither buyers nor sellers dominating.

items.title: Dividend Bonanza: RVNL, Bharat Dynamics, 73 others to turn ex-date Monday
items.description: Here is the full list of stocks, along with the dividend amount and other details, that will turn ex-dividend on Monday

items.title: Northern Arc Capital IPO allotment: Check status, GMP, likely listing gains
items.description: Once the allotment is finalised, investors can check the allotment status of Northern Arc Capital IPO by visiting the official websites of BSE, NSE, or Kfin Technologies, the registrar for the issue

items.title: Phoenix Mills rallies 7% as arm emerges highest bidder for plots in Punjab
items.description: The uptick in The Phoenix Mills share price came after the company said that it unit,  Casper Realty Private Limited, has been declared as the highest bidder for two prime city-centric plots in Mohali

items.title: IIFL Finance share price zooms 13% as RBI lifts ban on gold finance biz
items.description: The uptick in IIFL Finance share price came after the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) lifted ban on the company's gold finance business.

items.title: Nifty, Bank Nifty form shooting star on daily chart; consolidation ahead?
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 20: Technically, Nifty has formed a Shooting Star-like pattern on daily scale, signalling exhaustion of buying pressure, said analyst at Asit C. Mehta Investment

items.title: Reliance Infra jumps on debt reduction, fundraising plan; up 48% in 4 days
items.description: The company's Board has approved to raise Rs 3,014 crore through preferential issue. It will also consider a QIP worth Rs 3,000 crore

items.title: MSTC climbs 4% after govt approves sale of arm FSNL for Rs 320 crore
items.description: Japan based Konoike Transport Co. Ltd was the highest bidder for buying MSTC's subsidiary Ferro Scrap Nigam Limited (FSNL)

items.title: IPO allotment today: Check status for Arkade Developers, Western Carriers
items.description: Allotment of initial public offerings (IPOs) of Arkade Developers and Western Carriers (India) is likely to be finalised today. Here's how you can check the allotment status of these IPOs online

items.title: Cosmic CRF shares hit 5% upper circuit on Rs 127-crore order win; details
items.description: The surge in Cosmic CRF share price came after the company announced that its subsidiary, N S Engineering Projects, has secured an order worth Rs 127.44 crore from the infrastructure industry.

items.title: Indostar hits 52 week high as board approves sale of arm for Rs 1,750 cr
items.description: Indostar Capital Finance board approved the sale of IndoStar Home Finance for Rs 1,750 crore to WITKOPEEND B.V

items.title: Outsized 50-bps Fed rate cut positive for Silver; check trading strategy
items.description: Spot silver was extremely volatile in the wake of the US Fed cutting rates by 50-bps at its FOMC meeting concluded on September 18.

items.title: Gold trading strategy today: Resistance at Rs 75,100; Support at Rs 71,800
items.description: US yields and the US Dollar Index surged on no recession talks, which sent the yellow metal to $2547 in today's Asian session.

items.title: Mankind up 7% ahead of board meet for fund raising; m-cap tops Rs 1 trn
items.description: The board is to consider and approve the raising of funds by way of issue of non-convertible debentures, commercial papers, other debt securities or any other security or any combination thereof.

items.title: Sandur Manganese & Iron Ores gets approval to increase production; stock up
items.description: The uptick in the share price came after the company announced that it has secured approval from the Karnataka State Pollution Control Board (KSPCB) to increase its manganese ore production capacity.

items.title: Vodafone Idea at Rs 2.5 or Rs 15? Analysts divided after SC's AGR verdict
items.description: Vodafone Idea share price target: The lowest price target has been given by Goldman Sachs, with a 'Sell' rating, as it sees no government support/relief in AGR liabilities

items.title: Interarch Building bags orders worth Rs 634 cr so far in FY25; stock up 10%
items.description: In Q1FY25, the company secured new orders of Rs 341 crore, and in Q2FY25 till September 14, 2024, the company bagged orders of Rs 293 crore

items.title: Vodafone Idea stock at Rs 2.5 or Rs 15? Analysts divided after AGR order
items.description: Vodafone Idea share price target: The lowest price target has been given by Goldman Sachs, with a 'Sell' rating, as it sees no government support/relief in AGR liabilities

items.title: ITD Cementation surges 18% amid Adani Group's promoter's stake buy buzz
items.description: On July 3,Italian Thai Development Public Company, the Promoter shareholder of the company, informed that they are exploring a potential possible divestment of their investments in ITD Cementation

items.title: Voda Idea can slide another 44%, if this support is broken; hints chart
items.description: Voda Idea stock is seen trading below its key moving averages and now testing key support levels on the monthly scale, levels not violated since December 2021; check key levels here

items.title: Dividend, Bonus: Bharat Dynamics, CSL, 82 other stocks go ex-date next week
items.description: Here's the complete list of stocks that will trade ex-date next week for dividends, bonus issues, or stock splits

items.title: KEC International down 5% as CARE Ratings downgrades co's bank facilities
items.description: CARE Ratings downgrades KEC International's bank facilities; keeps outlook 'Stable' for company

items.title: Record Galore! Here's why Sensex rallied 1,100 points today; details here
items.description: The Sensex rallied 1.26 per cent or 1,055.7 points, hitting a fresh record high of 84,240.50. The Nifty 50 also saw a robust gain of 1.21 per cent, or 309.8 points, to a new all-time high of 25,726.65

items.title: ZEE hits 52-week low in strong market; stock tanks 54% thus far in CY2024
items.description: The stock of the television broadcasting & software production company was trading lower for a fifth straight day, down 8 per cent during the period

items.title: Mobility sector in Asian markets to absorb $1.3 trn in green fund by 2030
items.description: In India, the report said, electric scooters and three-wheelers are currently around USD 40-USD 112 cheaper per year to own than petrol alternatives

items.title: Patel Engineering up 5% on emerging lowest bidder for project of Rs 240 cr
items.description: The rise in Patel Engineering share price came after the company said that it has bagged an order worth Rs 240.02 crore from NHPC.

items.title: Cochin Shipyard shares hits 10% upper circuit ahead of ex-dividend date
items.description: The uptick in the stock price is attributed to investors rushing to counter as the company's shares will trade ex-dividend date on Monday, September 23, 2024

items.title: ACC, IRCTC: 4 stocks turn bearish even as Sensex, Nifty scale new highs
items.description: Technical chart suggests that ACC, IRCTC, PND and Aarti Industries could slide up to 28% from present levels owing to formation of 'Death Cross' on the daily chart; a long-term bearish indicator.

items.title: Axis Capital to explore legal remedies against Sebi's ban on debt segment
items.description: Axis Capital, a subsidiary of Axis Bank, clarified that it has not taken on any new assignments in the debt segment for over a year
